name: Wreckage of the Korvalis
description:
Wreckage of the Korvalis is a top down shooter game where you control the last remaining space marine on a crashed starship, and must fight your way out through the hordes of enemies.

Music Credits:

Evan King - Overgrowth, Metro City, Auto-Reverse, and Vectors
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?https://www.twitter.com/evankingaudio

Buy these songs at: https://https://evanking.bandcamp.com/

Or grab them as free downloads at: https://www.evankingmusic.com
